post.body: RichardatDELL: @thornley I knew young master Joseph before he was famous! [grin] What dates are you over here, Joe?
In a fit of desperation (I put the pro into procrastination) I'm going to attempt Voice Recognition in order to write! :-)
50% is usual affiliate commission on e-books, unless you have a really strong backend, in which case raise ebook commission
I just bought Aussie Dr Russ Harris' The Happiness Trap - but haven't started reading yet other than knowing it is based on ACT
Argh! The weather is gorgeous!! So much clothes washing being done, so much moping of floors, bugger all writing [grin]
So WHEN are we going to do that podcast interview? I have my sound issues sorted, I think...
I do nearly all of the womanly duties at BetterComms Towers, except cooking; I'm a phenomenally bad cook :-)
G'day Joseph, I'll do my best to nip over to Syd, even if it's just a fly-in/out on same day. Wouldn't want to miss a hero!
Ctrl+A, Ctrl+Q is my simple solution, else Ctrl+A, Delete :-)
@ebaxter : I reckon that is the number one wish of 100000s of us :-)
I spent AGES the last few days in SL - longest I've been in there in over a year! :-) http://bit.ly/yPaP + http://bit.ly/5Kl1
Dell Australia delivers on customer service: Now, if I could only win the lottery and pick up one of their faste.. http://tinyurl.com/9fw9d2
Liking the feeddemon screensaver for my feeds.
Quincy-ing -- too funny! http://bit.ly/pblZ
RT @chrisbrogan: Please retweet the HELL out of this post: http://is.gd/ezGB
Just updated my twitter profile background image, courtesy of brilliant design work of @SmartBoyDesigns -- thanks, Christian!! :-)
afk to go have a look at eldest stepdaughter's resume and cover letters for her job hunting
RT @verbAW: @ebaxter [snip] i often find more responses coming via facebook in response to twitter updates... :: | :: Me too; bizarre, huh?
wife is helping daughter with resumes and cover letters, leaving me to continue converting books on tape into digital files :-)
down twitterscope so no noise interferes with transfer from tapedeck to Soundbooth. Oh, really like Dreamweaver + Fireworks CS4; worth the $
